items.entry: A series of distractions that deflect attention from an important goal.

entries.name: Pit
entries: {@i A deep hole studded with spikes gapes in the earth. The Pit card represents a literal or metaphorical fall—losing status, wealth, or position.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person who has lost significant wealth, social status, or favor.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A pit trap, or a scavenger lurking at the bottom of a pit.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A pit or cliff that creates the risk of a fall.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: An art object depicting someone's calamitous fall, or a magic item that allows falling safely (such as a {@item Ring of Feather Falling}).

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation involving someone's fall from grace.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person in a precarious position who soon will have a calamitous fall.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature (such as a {@creature piercer}) that attacks by falling on prey.

items.name: Place
items.entry: An abandoned mansion or palace that is in disrepair due to the owner's downfall.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: An art object depicting flight or incorporating feathers, or a magic item that grants flight (such as {@item Winged Boots} or a {@item Cloak of the Bat}).

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A conspiracy to cause the downfall of a wealthy or prominent person.

entries.name: Plant
entries: {@i A myconid emits a cloud of spores. The Plant card reflects growth and natural life.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person who lives in the wilderness among trees and other growing things.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A Plant creature, or a creature that facilitates the growth of wild plants.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A verdant place where vegetation grows wild, untouched by people's hands.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: An art object crafted from wood or incorporating leaves; alternatively, a magic item that allows uncontrolled vegetation growth (such as a {@item Bag of Beans}).

items.name: Situation
items.entry: Something growing out of control with surprising, even supernatural, speed.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A quiet person who enjoys gardening or farming, finding greenery more relatable than people.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A domesticated plant given artificial animation, such as an {@creature awakened tree} or {@creature awakened shrub|MM|shrub}.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place full of carefully pruned and neatly controlled vegetation, such as a topiary garden.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A treasure that incorporates living greenery, such as an ornate terrarium or a potted topiary, or a magic item that allows control of vegetation (such as a {@item Staff of the Woodlands}).

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A conflict between a region suffering a famine and a region with abundant crops.

entries.name: Priest
entries: {@i A cleric holds a heavy mace. The Priest card represents wisdom, insight, closeness to the divine, and divine magic.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person (perhaps a cleric, druid, or paladin) who uses divine magic or is very pious.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature with abilities similar to those of a cleric, druid, or paladin.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A temple, shrine, or similar place consecrated to a deity or natural force.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A magic item such as a {@item Staff of Healing} or a {@item Holy Avenger}; alternatively, valuable temple accouterments.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A problem that requires and rewards piety or the use of divine magic.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person devoted to a false god, or a cause that isn't worthy of devotion.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A demon or another creature opposed to the gods.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place that was consecrated but that has been abandoned or converted to secular use.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: An idol depicting an invented god or a demon lord.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation caused by impiety or misguided zealotry.

entries.name: Prisoner
entries: {@i A rogue begs for release from a dank prison cell. The Prisoner card represents someone or something locked and hidden away.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person held captive or bound by expectations.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature locked away to prevent it from harming people.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place where things are put to keep them out of reach and memory.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A treasure securely locked away, or a magic item that contains a creature (such as an {@item Elemental Gem} or an {@item Iron Flask}).

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation arising from efforts to keep a person, an object, or information out of reach.

items.name: Person
items.entry: An individual who defies societal norms and expectations.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature that grapples, swallows, or otherwise binds or imprisons its prey.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place where something or someone is kept on public display.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A prominently displayed treasure, such as a ruler's regalia.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: The theft or liberation of a person, or an object on public display.

entries.name: Puzzle
entries: {@i An elaborate puzzle box floats in the air, glowing from within. The Puzzle card speaks to intelligence and strategic thinking.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person with a keen mind for puzzles, or one who delights in clever banter and wordplay.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A brilliant creature that relies on careful plans and tactics rather than brute strength, or a trap that can be bypassed by solving a puzzle or riddle.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place with hidden doors and other secrets.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A treasure whose function or value isn't immediately apparent.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A complex situation with many interconnected factors.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person who is very literal and direct.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature that delights in straightforward melee combat, relying on strength to overpower its foes.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place with a simple, symmetrical floor plan.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: Coins or other treasure whose value is obvious and almost universally understood.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation that's exactly what it appears to be.

entries.name: Ring
entries: {@i An emerald ring glows within a decorative jewelry box. The Ring card suggests both a promise and the honor involved in keeping it.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: Someone scrupulously faithful to a promise.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature that has promised to serve someone.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place where oaths are sworn, such as a temple or courthouse.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A ring, either jewelry or a magic item.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation complicated by a person's promise to do something.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person who resents being bound to an oath sworn in haste or duress.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature unwillingly bound to serve someone (such as an {@creature invisible stalker}).

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place where a legendary figure was coerced into swearing an oath that led to their downfall.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A bracelet or magic bracers.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation arising from someone trying to abjure an oath.

entries.name: Rogue
entries: {@i A roguish kenku lurking in the shadows holds a dagger, poised to strike. This card suggests treachery and deception.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A deceptive person hiding a sinister secret; pursuit of their own aims trumps any friendship or loyalty.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A dangerous creature that strikes by surprise or from darkness.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A front for a criminal operation, or a monster's lair.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A treasure that hides a deadly secret, such as a ring with a spring-loaded poison needle, a {@item Dagger of Venom}, or a cursed magic item.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation rooted in or destined for betrayal.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A good-hearted person entangled in a criminal or evil organization who is desperate for a way out.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature unwillingly bound to the service of villains.

items.name: Place
items.entry: An oasis of compassion surrounded by violence.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A treasure caked in grime or hidden in a filthy place.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: Good characters who are part of an evil organization or who plot to subvert it.

entries.name: Ruin
entries: {@i An elegant sword and crown disintegrate into eddies of ash. The Ruin card warns of the inevitability of decay and the danger of material attachments.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person who has renounced material attachments, such as a religious ascetic.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature that destroys equipment, such as a {@creature rust monster} or a {@creature black pudding}.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A ruin, or a retreat for ascetics.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A treasure that is broken or in disrepair.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation involving the decay of objects or relationships over a long period of time.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person excessively attached to material goods (not necessarily excessive wealth).

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A Construct, especially an animated object.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place meant to store goods, such as a warehouse or an armory.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: Valuable trade goods, well-made equipment, or a deed to property.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation involving the production or transportation of goods for sale.

entries.name: Sage
entries: {@i The mind of a sage is filled with obscure lore gained through exhaustive research. This card represents well-intentioned advice.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person who offers helpful advice in difficult circumstances.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A helpful creature that leads the way to safety or a goal.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place dedicated to knowledge and wisdom, such as a library or university.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A valuable or magical book or scroll, or a sentient magic item that is known to provide helpful advice.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: An opportunity to provide valuable ad- vice on a familiar subject.

items.name: Person
items.entry: Someone who helpfully offers bad advice.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: sA creature that tries to lead the way into danger or a trap.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place whose structural flaws threaten its integrity.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A device valuable for its components that doesn't function as intended, or a sentient magic item that provides bad but well-intentioned advice.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: An opportunity to provide advice on a completely unfamiliar subject.

entries.name: Shield
entries: {@i A circular shield is close at hand in a military barrack. The Shield card is a reminder of the need for protection.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A protective parent or sibling, or a professional protector such as a sentry or guard.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature that protects others, such as a watchdog or {@creature shield guardian}, or a warding trap designed to repel invaders.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A defensive structure, such as a fortress or a castle wall.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A valuable or magical shield.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: Someone who must protect those who can't protect themselves.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A guarded person who carefully shields themself from physical or emotional harm.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A heavily armored creature.

items.name: Place
items.entry: sA hermitage or retreat meant to isolate one person from others.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A suit of armor that is valuable or magical.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation arising from someone selfishly protecting themself without heed to others.

entries.name: Ship
entries: {@i A three-masted ship with a couatl figurehead sails across the open sea. The Ship card indicates a long journey, not necessarily by sea.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person who routinely travels long distances, such as a sailor, pilgrim, or nomad.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature that hunts a large territory or migrates great distances.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A port city, harbor, caravansary, or similar hub for travelers.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: An art object depicting ships or travel, or a magic item that facilitates travel (such as a {@item Folding Boat}).

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation that requires travel, or one that unfolds while traveling,

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person who dreams of travel but has never wandered far from home.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature that rarely leaves its lair—and is more powerful there.

items.name: Place
items.entry: An isolated place that rarely sees travelers.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A treasure still in the hands of the person who made it, or a magic item (such as {@item Dimensional Shackles}) that prevents magical movement.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation arising from someone's inability or unwillingness to travel.

entries.name: Skull
entries: {@i A skeletal figure is shrouded in a swirling robe, though its skull is clearly visible. The Skull card is a reminder of the universality of death—and the fact that everyone must confront death alone.s}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person facing imminent death, or one who wields necromantic power.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: An Undead creature, or a trap that deals necrotic damage.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place of solitude and isolation, or a place where someone died recently.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A treasure associated with death (perhaps funerary implements), or a magic item with necromantic power.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A person's life in peril.

items.name: Person
items.entry: Someone haunted by the inevitability of death and seeking to escape it, or a person who has returned from death.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: An immortal creature or one that doesn't age, such as an angel, a Fiend, or a naga.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A graveyard or another place where the dead are gathered.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: An art object that celebrates or depicts deliverance from death, or a magic item that wards off death (such as a {@item Periapt of Wound Closure} or a {@item Scarab of Protection}).

items.name: Situation
items.entry: Many lives at stake.

entries.name: Staff
entries: {@i An elegant black staff leans against a wall, waiting for its owner to return. The Staff card represents support or assistance.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person who offers physical, financial, or emotional support.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature used as a mount or a tracker, or another sort of ally.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place where support is offered or found, such as a library or a tavern.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A magic staff, a jeweled cane or mobility aid, or a similar treasure.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A group or organization that offers much-needed support.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person in desperate need of assistance.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature that's helpless or ineffective unless it can possess or be carried by another creature.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place in immediate crisis, such as a location suddenly imperiled by fire or flood.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A treasure that needs repair before regaining its full value or magical potency.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A group of people who need help from others.

entries.name: Stairway
entries: {@i A spiral stairway leads both up and down, but the downward stairs are cluttered and dark. This card points to a change in difficulty, either increasing or decreasing.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person who makes every task more difficult than it needs to be, adding complications and getting in the way.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature that grows in power as battle continues (such as a {@creature black pudding} or a {@creature hydra}).

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place reached by descending stairs, such as a basement or a lower level of a dungeon.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: An intricate treasure that was difficult to create, or a magic item that helps accomplish difficult tasks (such as an {@item Ioun Stone, Mastery|DMG|Ioun Stone of Mastery}).

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation more complicated or challenging than it appears.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A helpful, friendly person who makes everything easier (or at least more pleasant).

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature that is difficult to fight at first, but that becomes easier to defeat as the battle proceeds.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place reached by ascending stairs, such as an attic or upper level of a dungeon.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A treasure that is simple and elegant.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation much simpler than it appears,

entries.name: Star
entries: {@i A brilliant star shines in the spring sky at twilight. The Star card represents inherent ability and training working in concert—nature allied with nurture.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person focused on improving a particular area of skill or behavior.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature that has trained to improve itself (perhaps having several skill or saving throw proficiencies), or a trap that requires teamwork to avoid or escape.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place dedicated to study or training, such as a university or gymnasium.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: An art object that reflects the skill of its creator, or a magic item that grants proficiency.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation that requires or rewards training and practice.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person with natural ability but little patience for training or study.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature that relies on its natural abilities instead of training (perhaps with no skill or saving throw proficiencies).

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place of untouched natural beauty.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: Unrefined ore or uncut gems, or a magic item that improves an ability score.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation resulting from someone's refusal to practice or train.

entries.name: Statue
entries: {@i A statue depicts the god Istus offering the original {@item Deck of Many Things|DMG} as a gift. The Statue card is a reminder of the past.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: Someone who takes great pride in a prominent ancestor.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: An ancient creature that played an important part in a historical event.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A park or plaza built around a statue.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A statuette or sculpture, either valuable or magical (such as a {@item Figurine of Wondrous Power}).

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation with remarkable similarities to a significant historical event.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person who lives in the shadow of a famous or important ancestor.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature that clings to a memory of fallen glory (such as a {@creature storm giant} or a {@creature mind flayer}), a creature in the guise of a statue (such as a {@creature mimic}), or a statue that functions as a trap.

items.name: Place
items.entry: An immense ruin left behind by an ancient civilization.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: An art object made in imitation of a more famous and valuable piece.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: An attempt to re-create a historical situation or rebuild a fallen empire.

entries.name: Sun
entries: {@i A sun blazes brightly in the summer sky. The Sun card brings hope—either well-founded or deluded.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person with an unflappable and optimistic outlook, confident in the power of good triumphing over evil and obstacles.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: An angel or a similar creature that embodies hope and good.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place that embodies hope in the face of despair, such as a temple next to a graveyard or a town rebuilding after a natural disaster.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A valuable religious object devoted to good, or a holy or protective magic item.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A difficult situation where hope nevertheless continues to shine like a beacon.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A naively positive person who spouts empty platitudes about everything turning out for the best.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature (perhaps a {@creature flumph} or a {@creature pixie}) that offers aid but is too weak to provide meaningful help.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A desecrated temple or similar place where dirt or corruption has eliminated all evidence of goodness and holiness.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A religious object or holy magic item that has been desecrated.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: Idealistic optimism that prevents people from responding to real danger.

entries.name: Talons
entries: {@i A clawed hand reaches to grab an emerald ring which disintegrates at the claw's approach. The Talons card indicates greed or the rapacious hunger of a predator.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person who preys on other folk to acquire wealth or power.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A predator, especially one that preys on people or slowly drains their life (such as a {@creature vampire}).

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place where the rich benefit from the labor of the poor.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A treasure that is a collector's prized possession or the object of a heist.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation driven by someone's avarice.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person trapped by predatory debt or victimized by a monster that slowly drains the person's life.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature hunted for parts of its body that are considered valuable, or for the treasure it hoards.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A tenement or workhouse where oppressed victims of the rich live in squalor.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A treasure that was stolen from its rightful owner.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation driven by a desperate individual victimized by the greedy.

entries.name: Tavern
entries: {@i An adventuring party eats and laughs in a busy tavern. The Tavern card points to the pleasure of spending time with friends.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A genial person who delights in telling stories in good company.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A social creature that travels in packs.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A tavern, restaurant, or similar place where people gather and eat socially.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A jeweled goblet or other treasure related to eating and drinking.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A tavern brawl.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person who ruins the happiness of pleasant company.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A parasite, {@creature vampire}, or similar creature that siphons strength, happiness, or vitality from others, or a trap designed to separate those caught in it.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place once used for social gatherings but now abandoned.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A jeweled goblet or similar treasure stained with blood or holding the remnants of poison.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: An attempt to kill many people at once as they gather for a meal.

entries.name: Temple
entries: {@i A temple invites worshipers into the serene space within. The Temple card suggests the comfort found in ritual and communion with the divine.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A devout person who performs frequent rituals to invoke divine favor.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A temple guardian—perhaps a Celestial, Construct, or {@creature guardian naga}.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A temple, shrine, or other place of worship.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A valuable ritual object, such as a candelabra or sacrificial knife, or a magic item linked to worship or divine magic (such as a {@item Candle of Invocation}).

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation best resolved by an appeal to divine power or spiritual authorities.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A superstitious person who performs frequent rituals to ward off supernatural evil.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature that bestows curses (such as a {@creature fomorian}, {@creature rakshasa}, or {@creature mummy}).

items.name: Place
items.entry: An area where crime, vice, or other impious behaviors are widespread.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A treasure with superstitious meaning perhaps an amulet meant to ward off evil (such as a {@item Scarab of Protection}).

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation stemming from a superstitious fear of curses or bad luck.

entries.name: Throne
entries: {@i An ostentatious throne stands on a dais, with a crown on the seat and a ceremonial sword leaning against one armrest. This card represents the authority of worldly rulers.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person who enjoys exercising authority over others and expects to be obeyed.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature that leads others of its kind; alternatively, one with magical powers of influence or command.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place of authority, such as a palace or a mayor's office.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A ruler's regalia, or a magic item (such as a {@item Rod of Rulership}) that imparts magical authority.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A contest over who rightfully holds authority.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person who resents authority imposed on them.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature that unwillingly serves another.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place at the edge of a ruler's authority or son the border between rival nations.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: Treasure. An art object created as an act of resistance to tyranny, or a magic item that protects against restraint (such as a {@item Ring of Free Action}).

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A group of people rebelling against a ruler or an authority figure.

entries.name: Tomb
entries: {@i A burial chamber holds a plain stone casket. The Tomb card suggests buried secrets and things long forgotten.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person with a secret or a gap in their memory.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A {@creature mummy}, {@creature wight}, or similar Undead that lairs in its own tomb.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A tomb, especially one that is forgotten.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: Valuable or magical funerary treasure.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation no one wants to talk about or even acknowledge.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person trying to atone for a dreadful secret in their past.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: An incorporeal Undead (such as a {@creature wraith} or {@creature specter}) that's not linked to the place of its death, burial place, or body.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A memorial structure that doesn't contain a body.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: An art object depicting a dead individual as they were in life.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation stemming from a buried secret that recently came to light.

entries.name: Tower
entries: {@i A tall, ornate tower made of black stone looms over a desolate landscape. The Tower card represents isolation.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person who prefers solitude to the company of others.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A reclusive creature.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A remote tower or similar place of isolation.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: An art object depicting an isolated place or a lonely person; alternatively, {@item Daern's Instant Fortress} or a similar magic item.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation that requires assistance or information from a reclusive person.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A desperately lonely person who craves close companionship.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature cut off from others of its kind that is trying to find them, or a trap that targets a single creature.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place that discourages interaction with others, such as a library or monastery, where rules of silence are strictly enforced.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: An art object expressing the artist's profound loneliness.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation arising from someone's loneliness or boredom.

entries.name: Tree
entries: {@i A tree has broken through a fortress wall and reclaimed part of the keep. This card suggests perseverance in difficult circumstances.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A strong-willed person determined to persevere despite hostile conditions.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature that thrives in a hostile environment.

items.name: Place
items.entry: Somewhere vegetation makes an unexpected appearance: a park in a busy urban center or a tree growing on barren rock.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A treasure featuring diamonds, pearls, or precious wood, or a magic item that increases endurance (such as an {@item Amulet of Health}).

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A small outpost or lone individual holding back a much larger force.

items.name: Person
items.entry: Someone barely hanging on in hostile conditions.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature driven from its preferred environment and struggling to survive in a new region.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place cleared of natural growth.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: An art object or a magic item made from the wood of a tree struck by lightning.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: An overwhelming threat against a small outpost or lone individual.

entries.name: Undead
entries: {@i A lich beckons souls of the dead. This card can point to anything that refuses to die, from old grudges and unresolved issues to Undead creatures.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person nursing a grudge beyond reason.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: An Undead creature sustained by a thirst for revenge or an unfinished task, such as a {@creature ghost} or {@creature revenant}.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place haunted (literally or emotionally) by a terrible event that happened there.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A treasure depicting the dead or an Undead, something made from bones, or a magic item made by or for an Undead.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: Someone who refuses to leave the past in the past.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person too quick to forgive and forget, who never holds anyone accountable for their misdeeds.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: An Undead creature that craves an end to its miserable, interminable existence.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place whose denizens have forgotten significant events that happened there.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: An art object depicting the destruction of an Undead, or a magic item particularly useful against Undead (such as a {@item Mace of Disruption}).

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A serial criminal who has been pardoned for past misdeeds and now continues their wicked ways.

entries.name: Void
entries: {@i An endless void seems to spiral toward a central hole that devours all. This card spells disaster.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person trapped in despair.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A Fiend or an Undead that threatens annihilation of body and soul, or a trap with no easy exit or escape.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place deep underground, underwater, or in space, where little light and air are available.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: An art object that reflects its creator's despair or sadness, or a {@item Sphere of Annihilation}.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation that seems to have no good or even survivable—outcome.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person who has lost everything and has no place left to go but up.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A {@creature skeleton}, {@creature zombie}, or similar Undead remnant of a living creature; alternatively, a trap that's broken and nonfunctional.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A place of utter carnage, where a terrible battle or massacre took place.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A treasure promised but not actually present, such as an empty treasure chest or a looted vault.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: The aftermath of a destructive event, where the few survivors must figure out how to go on living.

entries.name: Warrior
entries: {@i A barbarian holds a greataxe, The Warrior card embodies physical strength and fighting acumen.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A person (perhaps a barbarian, fighter, or monk) who has trained in combat or served in the military.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature with abilities like those of a barbarian, fighter, or monk.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A training yard or fort where warriors learn combat skills.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A valuable or magical weapon or suit of armor.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation that requires and rewards the skilled application of physical force.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A bully who uses physical strength to intimidate others.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A creature that relies on brute strength, or a trap that can be escaped through the application of brute strength.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A harsh environment where only the physically powerful survive.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: An unsubtle work of art.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A situation involving bullying or extortion.

entries.name: Well
entries: {@i A stone well stands in a peaceful meadow, surrounded by wildflowers. The Well card speaks of drawing resources from familiar places.}

items.name: Person
items.entry: A familiar person who is a reliable source of information and aid.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A familiar kind of creature, whose abilities are well understood.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A well, a familiar shop, or a place where fresh water can be found.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A reliable treasure (such as gold coins), or a magic item that produces food or water (such as a {@item Decanter of Endless Water} or an {@item Alchemy Jug}).

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A familiar situation with a predictable outcome.

items.name: Person
items.entry: A familiar person who refuses to provide expected aid.

items.name: Creature or Trap
items.entry: A familiar kind of creature whose behavior or abilities are surprising.

items.name: Place
items.entry: A well that has gone dry, or a familiar place that no longer offers the comforts it used to.

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: A treasure with unexpected properties—a hidden compartment or magical quirk that's not immediately evident.

items.name: Situation
items.entry: A familiar situation that ends up defying expectations.
